text.__SUMMARY__:
The streaked rosefinch (Carpodacus rubicilloides) is a true finch species (family Fringillidae). It is found in Bhutan, China, India, and Nepal. Its natural habitat is boreal shrubland.
Two subspecies are recognised:
C. r. rubicilloides - east Tibet to central and southern China
C. r. lucifer - southern Tibet and the Himalayas
